verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:13
verses.text: And the glede, and the kite, and the vulture after his kind,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:14
verses.text: And every raven after his kind,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:15
verses.text: And the owl, and the night hawk, and the cuckow, and the hawk after his kind,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:16
verses.text: The little owl, and the great owl, and the swan,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:17
verses.text: And the pelican, and the gier eagle, and the cormorant,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:18
verses.text: And the stork, and the heron after her kind, and the lapwing, and the bat.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:19
verses.text: And every creeping thing that flieth is unclean unto you: they shall not be eaten.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:20
verses.text: But of all clean fowls ye may eat.
